title: Seminar in Science Studies
description: Study and discussion of a selected topic in the science studies field with an emphasis on the development of research and writing skills. The topic varies from year to year. ANTH 272, COGR 225B, HIGR 239, PHIL 209B, and SOCG 255B may be repeated and taken for credit in any combination for a combined total of six times. Prerequisites: graduate standing.
